Posted By: Winterhawk200 (7/23/2010 10:36:56 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: A 0/8 wall can stop one little flyer. A 3/5 wall can stop a bunch- most opponents won't sacrifice a creature each turn to combat. Which isn't to say this is better than [Wall of Denial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall of Denial)- it's not. But Wall of Swords can do some things Denial can't.
posts.html:
A 0/8 wall can stop one little flyer. A 3/5 wall can stop a bunch- most opponents won't sacrifice a creature each turn to combat. Which isn't to say this is better than Wall of Denial- it's not. But Wall of Swords can do some things Denial can't.

Posted By: ScissorsLizard (5/20/2010 8:06:40 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: [Wall of Denial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall of Denial) also requires blue mana. This one can be played in mono-white or any other combination with white that doesn't include blue. Finally, this wall can actually kill certain things it blocks, rather than be a 0-power unpumpable schmuck ('cause of shroud).

Posted By: Goatllama (12/19/2010 2:35:17 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
*I am the bone of my sword.  
  
Steel is my body, and fire is my blood.  
  
I have created over a thousand blades.  
  
Unknown to death.  
  
Nor known to life.  
  
Have withstood pain to create many weapons.  
  
Yet those hands will never hold anything.  
  
So, as I pray,*  
**UNLIMITED BLADE WORKS**

So, as I pray,

UNLIMITED BLADE WORKS

I like Wall of Swords. Especially with this art. If I had a monowhite deck right now I'd be rocking this for sure.
